Name: Making the periodic reports of lobbyists available online.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to making the periodic reports of lobbyists available online.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Governmental Operations
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section One.  Section 3-216 of subchapter 2 of title 3 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new paragraph 3 to subdivision (d), to read as follows:
(3) All such periodic reports shall be made available online at the official website of the city clerk, and shall be kept on such website for five years.   
	Â§2.  This law shall take effect six months after the date of enactment.
